Name: Area 51 Defense
About the game: Area 51 Defense is an action-packed survival shooter with a deadly arsenal, monstrous enemies and explosive action! Mysterious forces are amassing near the air force base of Area 51. You are a lone soldier fending off these supernatural invaders. Use an arsenal of 8 deadly weapons Eliminate various monsters and mutants Get kill streaks and special combos Discover different power-ups to help your survival Shoot the gas bottles to create a trap for the invaders Experiment with the in-built level editor Gain the highest score and climb up the Steam Leaderboards And try to survive as many waves as you can! For all the players looking for new releases from GameRealmMadness - ENEMY REMAINS is a punishing and action-packed continuation to Kalaban, with all new frights, foes and horrors. Available now on Steam Early Access! /
